author: Keith Rozario
content:
Sorry William it isn't. I'm not sure if they have a HD channel, but even then I'd be surprised if HD could be streamed via a regular Unifi connection. Most of it is just standard definition.Â 

That being said, they've sacrificed quality for on demand convenience, and I think it's a good tradeoff. For instance I just watched the expendables on demand, and the fact that it wasn't HD didn't throw me off one bit :)
